text: In the figure the circuit diagrams are labeled (1), (2), (3), and (4). In these circuits there are 8 ideal (no fringing) parallel-plate capacitors labeled [mathjaxinline]C_1, C_2, \ldots , C_8[/mathjaxinline]. All the capacitors have the same plate areas [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] and plate spacings [mathjaxinline]d[/mathjaxinline]. Capacitor [mathjaxinline]C_7[/mathjaxinline] has a slab of dielectric inserted half-way into the space between its plates; capacitors [mathjaxinline]C_2[/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline]C_5[/mathjaxinline] are filled with this dielectric. The dielectric constant of the dielectric is [mathjaxinline]\kappa _{\rm e} = 5[/mathjaxinline].
